page.title: 18SOCIAL CONCERNS.STANFORD.
page.content: Services still available to the area are limited to a twice daily postal collection, weekly refuse collection and weekly mobile library. Social activities are centred on the Parish Room which is the venue for the monthly meeting of the Stanford with Postling Womens Institute. A Craft Fair is held by this organisation yearly, the Church organises a Christmas Fair at the beginning of December and there is also a Summer Fete. Meetings of the British Legion are held at various locations in the village throughout the year. There is at least one service every Sunday at the Church of All Saints which is fairly well attended. In short villagers are trying to keep the community spirit alive under increasing difficulties.
